components.name: CLI Interface
components.description: Command-line interface for user interaction and deployment task initiation.

components.name: Task Execution Engine
components.description: Core component handling deployment workflows, plugin execution, and task orchestration.

components.name: Git Integration
components.description: Module for interacting with Git repositories to manage code versions and deployment branches.

components.name: Secrets Manager
components.description: Secure storage and retrieval of sensitive data like API keys and credentials.

data_flows.description: User commands and deployment parameters are passed from CLI to the task engine.
Deployment tasks trigger Git operations like branch switching and commit retrieval.
Authentication credentials and secrets are injected into the task engine for secure operations.

trust_boundaries.name: User CLI Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: CLI interface is considered trusted as it originates from authenticated users, but input validation is required.
